code: export const getCouleurNote=note=>{if(note>=7)return{bg:'linear-gradient(90deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üî•'};if(note>=5)return{bg:'linear-gradient(90deg, #f59e0b 0%, #d97706 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üëç'};return{bg:'linear-gradient(90deg, #ef4444 0%, #dc2626 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üí™'};};export const getCouleurEquipe=note=>{if(note>=7)return{bg:'linear-gradient(90deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üèÜ',text:'Excellente performance !'};if(note>=5)return{bg:'linear-gradient(90deg, #f59e0b 0%, #d97706 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'‚öΩ',text:'Performance correcte'};return{bg:'linear-gradient(90deg, #ef4444 0%, #dc2626 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üí™',text:'√Ä am√©liorer ensemble'};};export const getCouleurEvaluation=note=>{if(note>=8)return{bg:'linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üî•',text:'Excellent',border:'#059669'};if(note>=6.5)return{bg:'linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6 0%, #2563eb 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'‚≠ê',text:'Tr√®s bien',border:'#2563eb'};if(note>=5)return{bg:'linear-gradient(135deg, #f59e0b 0%, #d97706 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üëç',text:'Bien',border:'#d97706'};return{bg:'linear-gradient(135deg, #ef4444 0%, #dc2626 100%)',color:'white',emoji:'üí™',text:'√Ä am√©liorer',border:'#dc2626'};};
